title: Don’t you have something you’ve written that’s just too good to keep to yourself?
sub-title: Why not share your feelings with others?
section1-title:
Share inspirational quotes,
memorable lines, or fun facts.
section1-sub-title: Share those cherished words you’ve kept to yourself with others.
section2-title: Get the right comfort for how you’re feeling.
section2-sub-title: You can browse posts by tag.
section3-title:
Get a quick statistical overview of
how you’ve been feeling lately.
section3-sub-title: Use the mood calendar to see your emotions at a glance.
